articles.title: Jim Cramer Shares Bearish Sentiment Toward Lucid Group

articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Jim Cramer Shares Bearish Sentiment Toward Lucid Group. Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer answered questions about. When a caller asked about the stock, Cramer was quick to comment, “I’ll give you my answer: [sell, sell, sell].” Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) develops and produces electric vehicles, powertrains, battery systems, and proprietary in-house software. When a caller asked whether […] Related tickers mentioned: RIVN.

articles.title: Lucid Group, Inc. (LCID) Announces Introduction Of Lucid Recharged
articles.mainIdea: Lucid Group, Inc. (LCID) Announces Introduction Of Lucid Recharged
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Lucid Group, Inc. (LCID) Announces Introduction Of Lucid Recharged. Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) is among 10 Best EV Stocks to Buy Heading into 2026. On December 15, 2025, Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) disclosed the introduction of the “Lucid Recharged” certified pre-owned electric vehicle service.
